metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3804 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
It was found that cockpit before version 184 used glib's base64 decode functionality incorrectly resulting in a denial of service attack. An unauthenticated attacker could send a specially crafted request with an invalid base64-encoded cookie which could cause the web service to crash.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3804` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cockpit - 277-1
cockpit-bridge - 277-1
cockpit-networkmanager - 277-1
cockpit-packagekit - 277-1
cockpit-pcp - 277-1
cockpit-sosreport - 277-1
cockpit-storaged - 277-1
cockpit-system - 277-1
cockpit-tests - 277-1
cockpit-ws - 277-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cockpit package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '277-1').
